tool_description: All the informations about Bitcoin from the biggest newspapers from around the world.
name: Bitcoin news and rumours
title: Bitcoin news and rumours

api_list.name: News about Bitcoin from selected newspaper
api_list.description: That endpoint return everything what selected newspaper says about Bitcoin.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com/news/sydneymh"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-news-and-rumours.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
